text: Boloria kriemhild, the relict fritillary, is a species of fritillary in the family Nymphalidae. It is found in North America. The MONA or Hodges number for Boloria kriemhild is 4468. ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * * * * * * * Category:Boloria Category:Butterflies described in 1879
title: Boloria kriemhild
